{{location infobox | name=Snowmane's Howe | image=The Lord of the Rings Online - Snowmane's Howe.jpg | caption=Snowmane's Howe in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'' | pronun= | othernames= | location=[[Pelennor Fields]] | type=Hollow | description=Snowmane's burial mound{{HM|RC}}, p. 564 | regions= | towns= | inhabitants=[[Snowmane]] | created=[[Rohirrim]] | destroyed= | events= }} {{quote|Faithful servant yet master's bane,
Lightfoot's foal, swift Snowmane|Carved upon the stone in Snowmane's Howe}} '''Snowmane's Howe''' was the place on the [[Pelennor Fields]] where the horse of [[Théoden|King Théoden]], [[Snowmane]], fell and was subsequently buried by the [[Rohirrim]]. Upon that hollow, a stone was erected and there the grass grew the most green and long ever after.{{RK|V6}} ==Portrayal in adaptations== '''2016: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':''' :Snowmane's Howe is a memorial on the post-battle version of the [[Pelennor Fields]]. {{references}} [[Category:Gondor]] [[Category:Graves and tombs]] [[de:Schneemähnes Hügel]] [[fr:encyclo/personnages/animaux/chevaux/snawmana]] [[fi:Lumiharjan kumpu]]
